data.value: Don't show again

data.name: HelpShowhelpagain
data.value: You can show this help at any time by clicking {0} at the foot of the page

data.name: HelpString
data.value: Help

data.name: HelpWelcome
data.value: Welcome to Langademy!

data.name: LangademyState
data.value: Langademy state

data.name: ChatRoomsIntro
data.value: The chat rooms are the place where you can go to exchange languages with a native. Select a room in your right panel and start practicing your favourite language! Remember that you can check the meetup board to know when the chat room meetups take place.

data.name: TimeBankDescription
data.value: The Time Bank is a way to make language exchange fair for everyone at Langademy. This is how it works:

data.name: TimeBankF1
data.value: You will begin with 2 hours so you can practice the language you want.

data.name: TimeBankF2
data.value: By default, you will not be able to accumulate more than 10 hours in your Time Bank account.

data.name: TimeBankF3
data.value: Invite your friends and you will get 30 extra minutes for each friend that is registered with your invitation. You can also earn hours for your Time Bank account Â by following Langademy on Twitter and Facebook (+ 60 minutes).

data.name: TimeBankF4
data.value: When you practice a language that is not your native language, you spend time from your Time Bank account. If you speak to a non-native in your native language (minimum level: C2), you will be rewarded with time in your account.

data.name: TimeBankF5
data.value: Calls that are shorter than a minute have no cost

data.name: TimeBankTitle
data.value: Time Bank

data.name: HelpChatRoom
data.value: Chat Rooms

data.name: WalletTitle
data.value: Wallet

data.name: HelpIndex
data.value: Index

data.name: HelpGeneralTitle
data.value: How does Langademy work?

data.name: HelpGoToIndex
data.value: Return to index

data.name: HelpLangademyStateTitle
data.value: Langademy state

data.name: HelpLearnersTitle
data.value: Learners: how to start

data.name: HelpNativesFeeTitle
data.value: Native speakers fee

data.name: HelpNativesSent1
data.value: If you want to chat in your native language, you have to go the Wallet chat room of your native language, where you will find language learners to speak with.

data.name: HelpNativesSent2
data.value: But firstly, you have to meet some requirements:

data.name: HelpNativesSent3
data.value: Each Wallet chat room requires a minimum number of up votes. So go to the Time Banking chat rooms, talk to other language learners and gain positive up votes. Once you gain the required number of positive votes in a certain language, you will be able to enter the Wallet chat room of that specific language.

data.name: HelpNativesSent4
data.value: Fill your billing data. Before entering any Wallet room, you need to fill your billing address in the MyWallet app -> Billing info.

data.name: HelpNativesSent5
data.value: Once you meet these two requirements, you are ready to enter the Wallet rooms.

data.name: HelpNativesTitle
data.value: Native speakers: how to start

data.name: HelpTBIntroTitle
data.value: Time Banking introduction

data.name: HelpTBRoomsTitle
data.value: Time Banking chat rooms

data.name: HelpTBWorkTitle
data.value: How does Time Banking work?

data.name: HelpWalletIntroTitle
data.value: Wallet introduction

data.name: HelpWalletRoomsTitle
data.value: Wallet chat rooms and Wallet video calls

data.name: HelpWithdrawalTitle
data.value: Credit withdrawal

data.name: HelpRelatedArticles
data.value: Related articles

data.name: HelpState1
data.value: You can change your state from your home screen. Click your avatar and the left panel will be opened.

data.name: HelpState2
data.value: Once there, you have different options regarding your state:

data.name: HelpState3
data.value: If you donât want to receive any calls, just set your state to busy

data.name: HelpState4
data.value: Time Banking rooms: These rooms have two states. With the first state, you can select if you want to receive calls from the Time Banking room of a specific language. The seconds state lets you switch on and off the automatic partner finder. If you disable de overall state of a language, the automatic partner finder will also be disabled.

data.name: HelpState5
data.value: Wallet rooms: Disable the rooms of the languages that you donât want to receive calls.

data.name: HelpState6
data.value: Automatic partner finder

data.name: HelpState7
data.value: Langademy will find you an online partner that meets your preferences and that is available to speak with you. When a match is found, you will receive a notification asking if you want to start a call with the chosen partner.

data.name: HelpStudentIntro1
data.value: Language learners have two options if they want to practice a language: they can use either the Wallet rooms or the Time Banking rooms.

data.name: HelpStudentIntro2
data.value: In the Wallet rooms, language learners pay in order to have a conversation with a native. In the Time Banking rooms, time is used as a trade. Check the {0} and the {1} sections for more information about these rooms.

data.name: HelpStudentIntro3
data.value: When you meet new partners in a room, you can send them a connection request. Once you are connected, you will be able to make video calls without entering the rooms.

data.name: HelpTBIntro1
data.value: Time Banking provides a way to learn languages without spending money: the amount of time you use for speaking with other language learners in your native language will be added to your Time Banking account. Check the Time Banking rules ({0}).

data.name: HelpTBIntro2
data.value: To practice a language, go to the Time Banking rooms, start chatting with people and make video calls with them. In your home page, you can check your Time Banking account balance, and if you go to the Time Banking app you will see the history and details of your Time Banking account.

data.name: HelpTBRooms1
data.value: Time Banking rooms are the place where you can find language exchange partners. In these rooms you can chat for free or make Time Banking video calls (check {0}).

data.name: HelpTBRooms2
data.value: You can see what users are online in the left user panel. If you click the user, you will see different options that each user provides: you can add them as partners, make video calls, and report or block them.

data.name: HelpTBRooms3
data.value: If the room is empty or there is no activity at the moment, you can create Meetups to tell the others when you will be free to have a chat or a video call. You can also join the existing meetups.

data.name: HelpTBRooms4
data.value: Creating meetups in the Meetup Board

data.name: HelpTBRooms5
data.value: On the other hand, if you are attending a meetup, you can propose new topics for the meetup or vote the topics that other users have proposed.

data.name: HelpTBRooms6
data.value: You can go to the Meetup Board from your Time Banking room or from your home page. Once there, you will see all the meetups that are scheduled in the languages that you have in your profile. If you want to create a new meetup, select a language, day and time of the meetup and create the meetup. Once a meetup is created, you can invite your Langademy contacts to it.

data.name: HelpWalletFees1
data.value: Native speakers are charged the 13% of the amount (+ taxes) that have been charged to the language learner. Once a video call is finished, native speakers will have their available credit balance updated.

data.name: HelpWalletFees2
data.value: In order to understand how the available balance is calculated, several terms need to be explained:

data.name: HelpWalletFees3
data.value: Total Balance: It shows the total amount of credits before the 13% fee is applied to it.

data.name: HelpWalletFees4
data.value: Langademy fee: At the end of the month, Langademy will charge a 13% fee to the conversations of the native speakers. This fee will be reflected on the next invoice. The fee is not taken from the nativeâs account until the next invoice is emitted, however it cannot be used to make other purchases either.

data.name: HelpWalletFees5
data.value: Pending withdrawal requests: If a credit withdrawal is requested, the amount of credits that have been requested won't be available to use.

data.name: HelpWalletFees6
data.value: Available balance: In the view of the abovementioned terms, this is how available balance is calculated

data.name: HelpWalletFees7
data.value: Available balance = total balance â Langademy fee â amount of credits requested for withdrawal

data.name: HelpWalletWithdrawal1
data.value: Credit withdrawal can be requested in My Wallet -> Withdrawals

data.name: HelpWalletWithdrawal2
data.value: Credit Withdrawals are processed every 15 days. If you want, you can edit the amount of credits you have requested before the processing of the withdrawal has begun. Once the request has been done, you canât make another request until the previous request has been processed.

data.name: HelpWCR1
data.value: Wallet chat rooms are the meeting point for native speakers and language learners. In these rooms, language learners can chat and make video calls with the native speakers. Each native speaker has an hourly rate, which will be applied when a video call is made. During a call, the cost of the call will be updated each minute, so language learners will only pay for the number of minutes they talk. In each call, there will be a 3-minutes-long trial so the language learners can decide if they want to continue with the call before they start to pay.

data.name: HelpWCR2
data.value: Requirements to enter the Wallet Rooms

data.name: HelpWCR3
data.value: Both native speakers and language learners have meet some requirements to enter each of the Wallet chat rooms.

data.name: HelpWCR4
data.value: Requirements for language learners:

data.name: HelpWCR5
data.value: Chatting in the Wallet rooms itâs free. However, language learners have to buy credits if they want have access to the wallet rooms. Once they have made a purchase, they can chat and make video calls with native speakers. During a call, the rate that have been specified by the native speaker will be applied to the call

data.name: HelpWCR6
data.value: Requirements for native speakers:

data.name: HelpWCR7
data.value: Native speakers have to meet two requirements if they want to enter a Wallet room:

data.name: HelpWCR8
data.value: Each Wallet room requires to have a minimum number of positive votes. In order to gain positive votes, native speakers can go to the Time Banking room of the same language, make video calls with language learners and earn positive votes. If a native speaker wants to gather learners at a certain date and time, they can create meetups. More info at {0}

data.name: HelpWCR9
data.value: Complete the billing address: Go to My Wallet and complete the billing address.

data.name: HelpWalletIntro1
data.value: My Wallet is the app where you can manage your finances at Langademy. In this app you can check your transactions, billing history and add or edit your billing information. Wallet also provides credit purchase and credit withdrawal requests.

data.name: HelpWalletIntro2
data.value: If you are at Langademy to learn languages, go to the Wallet chat rooms and look for native speakers and their rates.

data.name: HelpWalletIntro3
data.value: If you want to earn some money while you speak with languages learners, you will have to earn some reputation in the Time Banking rooms before you can enter the Wallet chat rooms ({0})

data.name: HelpHeaderTitle
data.value: Langademy Help

data.name: HelpIndexTitle
data.value: How can we help you?

data.name: HelpNativesSent6
data.value: Introduction to Wallet rooms and calls

data.name: HelpNativesSent7
data.value: When you enter a Wallet room for the first time, you will have to specify a rate for your calls (in case you havenât defined it before). Once you are in a room, you can chat with the language learners while you wait someone to call you. If you have a good reputation and you make a good impression in the chat room, it will be easier to receive calls.

data.name: HelpNativesSent8
data.value: When you receive a video call, your rate will be applied to the call and your Wallet credit balance will be updated once the call is finished. Each call will have a fee ({0}) that will be charged to your account at the end of the month.

data.name: HelpCheckPrices
data.value: check prices
